item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Simon and Garfunkel
item.description: "I've got nothing to do today but smile." -- Simon and Garfunkel

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears." -- John Lennon

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Lucille Ball
item.description: "It's a helluva start, being able to recognize what makes you happy. " -- Lucille Ball

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by George Washington Burnap
item.description: "The grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for." -- George Washington Burnap

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Nicolas Chamfort
item.description: "A day without laughter is a day wasted." -- Nicolas Chamfort

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The earth laughs in flowers." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The human race has only one really effective weapon and that is laughter." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Wrinkles should merely indicate where the smiles have been." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do one thing every day that scares you." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Lenny Bruce
item.description: "There are never enough 'I love you's." -- Lenny Bruce

item.title: Hmeenen add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Sometimes people are beautiful. Not in looks. Not in what they say. Just in what they are." -- Markus Zusak
